attributes.additional_details: Why do we not have Youth Parliament? With the recent riots nationwide youth have had a bad press - there are many young people who have a lot to offer society so why not let them have their own parliament where their ideas can be submitted to Parliament as are epetitions - I am sure they will come up with ideas our older politicians would never think of - This would be a boost to David Cameron's Big Society idea

rejection.details: A UK Youth Parliament is already in existence.
